DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Tissue Composition Fat Measurement Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response regarding the ratio of fat tissue to the total amount of resected tissue calculated as a percentage.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._The way in which something is made, especially in terms of its different parts; its constituents._The determination of the amount of fat present in a sample.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:The way in which something is made, especially in terms of its different parts; its constituents.:The determination of the amount of fat present in a sample.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
The way in which something is made, especially in terms of its different parts; its constituents.
The determination of the amount of fat present in a sample.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._The way in which something is made, especially in terms of its different parts; its constituents._A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
